storyInfo: Lazvar must find a lost auction item as the Great Bazaar Auction draws near.

attributes.content: Mio? Mio!
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Shakes tail irritably)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: What's the matter, Mio? You've been drowsy since yesterday...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Strange. Are you sick? Let me see...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: *Ancient Sargonian*!
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Get your hands off my eyelids, impertinent servant!
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: If you keep doing that, I'll...
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Zzz...
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Mio? Passed out again...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Don't worry, Lazvar, we're not as frail as you think.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: The auction is about to start. I've got to go... Look after Mio for me, won't you?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Leave it to me.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: We know that you have many responsibilities, aside from seeking the Guardian's gem.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Spend your limited time and energy on more important matters.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Lost? You lost the Falling Star?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: W-We're so sorry! We spent all night searching every corner of the warehouse, but couldn't find it anywhere...
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: That's supposed to be the highlight of the auction...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: What do we do, Mr. Lazvar? The auction's about to start...
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: Doyard, get in touch with everyone who came to the warehouse in the past several days, especially anyone who inquired or came into contact with the Falling Star.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: Abbas, draft a contingency plan on the delay of the auction. Estimate the cost for rescheduling and the total liquidated damages.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Male Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: I'll look for new consignors, see if we can get something on par with or better than the Falling Star.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Let's focus on our jobs for now. Don't worry, we'll find a way.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: ...Understood, Mr. Lazvar. We'll do as you say.
attributes.name: Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: I thought we were going to get fired for sure. I guess the high turnover at the trading post wasn't because of the staff making mistakes?
attributes.name: Male Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: And thinking of it, why does trouble always happen at the worst possible time?
attributes.name: Male Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: Let's hope we can find it... I really wish this was all just a bad dream.
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: ...So, we would very much appreciate it if you have any gems you're interested in auctioning.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I'm really sorry, but a customer already bought out our best gems a few days ago.
attributes.name: Apologetic Shopkeeper

attributes.content: No need to apologize. I didn't give you any notice I'd be coming, after all.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I'm afraid you've seen all my goods, Mr. Lazvar. I don't think we have any gems that can satisfy your requirements.
attributes.name: Tired Shopkeeper

attributes.content: It's fine, I'll just keep looking around. Thank you for your time.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: How about this crystal brooch, Mr. Lazvar?
attributes.name: Earnest Shopkeeper

attributes.content: I'm afraid its flaws are too apparent to be the highlight of an auction.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: All you need to do is give it a good starting price, just a tad bit higher than the other items...
attributes.name: Earnest Shopkeeper

attributes.content: If it's the overseer's appraisal, then it's all legit! We can offer many, er, perks, if you would just nod...
attributes.name: Earnest Shopkeeper

attributes.content: No, thank you.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I'll take my leave.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Mr. Lazvar?
attributes.name: Cautious Voice

attributes.content: Abbas? What is it?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Bad news, sir.
attributes.name: Cautious Voice

attributes.content: The Lord Ameer just sent word that a wealthy foreign merchant by the name of Sotheby is coming to Menat in a few days to discuss business, and instructs us to welcome him with the utmost hospitality.
attributes.name: Cautious Voice

attributes.content: Mr. Sotheby came for the gem with healing effects that's being auctioned. Considering his schedule, we can't delay the event for too long.
attributes.name: Cautious Voice

attributes.content: The Lord Ameer's herald said that Mr. Sotheby saw the auction leaflet and is very interested in the healing effects of the Falling Star. He wants to have a look at the gem at the preview.
attributes.name: Cautious Voice

attributes.content: How long is Mr. Sotheby staying?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: He's going to Siesta for the music festival next, so up to one week, at most.
attributes.name: Cautious Voice

attributes.content: Move the auction to the day before he leaves.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Has Doyard looked into those who had contact with the Falling Star?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Yes, sir. They all came up clean. It's strange...
attributes.name: Cautious Voice

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Mr. Lazvar?
attributes.name: Cautious Voice

attributes.content: It's nothing. I got it.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I'll be hanging up if there's nothing else.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: What is it this time?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Hello! Are you perhaps in a spot of trouble?
attributes.name: Polite Voice

attributes.content: ...Who is this?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Ah, pardon me. This is Four-Fin Domestic Services Limited.
attributes.name: Polite Voice

attributes.content: We help take care of every problem in your life: appliance repair, plumbing, pest extermination, and even looking for lost items!
attributes.name: Polite Voice

attributes.content: Feel free to call us at this number if you need anything!
attributes.name: Polite Voice

attributes.content: I don't.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Really? But you sound really tired. Are you sureâ€”
attributes.name: Polite Voice

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: It's okay! Just tell us what's troubling you, and we'll do our best to help with whatever it is!
attributes.name: Polite Voice

attributes.content: Maybe you could save our number?
attributes.name: Polite Voice

attributes.content: That's enough...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Wait. Did he say 'looking for lost items'?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: No, what am I thinking... was I really considering asking a dodgy 'domestic service' company to help find an auction item?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Can't keep thinking about the Falling Star... I've got to find another way.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: A dark alley. This is the shortest route from the Great Bazaar back to the trading post.
The young overseer walks alone. There are voices coming through the gaps in the brick walls.
Looks like there's trouble at the trading post again...
attributes.name: Voices in Discussion

attributes.content: Ha! Nothing to worry about. Not the first time and won't be the last.
attributes.name: Voices in Discussion

attributes.content: Mr. Lazvar is always meticulous about the auctions... but who cares if one doesn't go well once in a while?
attributes.name: Voices in Discussion

attributes.content: You think it won't go well? The show will go on, as long as those magical healing gems keep coming to Menat-Ha'mait.
attributes.name: Voices in Discussion

attributes.content: Just you wait. With Mr. Lazvar around, this will be the best auction ever!
attributes.name: Voices in Discussion

attributes.content: The overseer recalls hiding in this dark alley as a child, making his mother and grandfather fret as they looked for them.
He had innocently believed that doing so would make them open that heavy brick-colored door, and walk away from the burden of responsibility and guilt.
Now, though, he feels the weight his ancestors felt on their own hearts as they walked through here like never before.
Suddenly, he sees a familiar figure.
Dio? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: It's getting very late.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Oh, I didn't realize... I should have been spending more time with you guys.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: What about Mio? Getting any better?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: You should worry more about yourself.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Come home, Lazvar, and have a good sleep.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: The next day...
...My head hurts.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I told you to get sleep, not to stay up all night.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: I had to look through the bidders' files. We don't have much time, and I need to figure out what they need, and what they like.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Say, are you sure you don't want me to get a vet to take a look at Mio? I'm still concerned...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I told you, humans can't see us unless we want to be seen. Give it up.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Hey, what are...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Stop licking my wrist, Dio. Oh, it tickles... I know, I know, you want me to pat you on the head, right?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Looks up)
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Sorry I've been neglecting you guys...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I'm fine, and Mio will be too. You shouldn't neglect your own feelings.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: That forced smile on your face is exactly like the one in this photo.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Photo? You mean Mr. Sotheby's?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Yeah. Everyone else in the photo is grinning from ear to ear, but he's the only one barely even raising the corners of his mouth.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: You're right.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Hey, it's the same for all his other photos in the file... even in the one with his favorite band.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: What does it mean?
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: It means you may just have done me a huge favor, Dio.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Mr. Farshid.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I was wondering who could get my secretary to arrange an urgent meeting first thing in the morning. No wonder.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: What brings you here personally, Mr. Lazvar?
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: I want to make a deal.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I know there is a perfectly cut yellowish-green gem in your collection, immaculate in both appearance and efficacy.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: ...The Sun of Sand.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: I see. You want to craft it into an auction highlight?
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: Exactly.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I'm sure you understand, Mr. Farshid, that the overseer seldom leaves the Great Bazaar to deal with citizens not in the gem trade.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Is that so? I thought your mother and grandfather never came to me because they didn't like me.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: I was a rule-breaker. I abused their names to raise prices on my gems, they said.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: You did. It was against the principles of the gem trading post.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Anyway, my gem vendor permit was revoked... Fortunately, my advertising company is still doing well.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: I just feel sorry for my gems sitting at home collecting dust, with no one to admire it but myself.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: I take it your answer is no.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Very well then. I apologize for taking up your time.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Wait! One second.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: As an honest citizen of Menat, I'm of course happy to support the new overseer.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: But the consigning fee is not insignificant, you understand...
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: We can waive it.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: ...And my vendor permit?
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: You can submit an application for reinstatement. I will approve it after the probation period.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: There's a probation period?
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: ...Do not push your luck.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Ha. Well, everyone in this town knows that your word is golden, Mr. Lazvar, and I suppose showing some good faith is the least I could do.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: I'll have the Sun of Sand sent to the trading post.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: What did Farshid say? I heard he had a grudge against the trading post...
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: He said yes.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Oh, thank goodness.
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: I was sure it didn't go well, what with that look on your face...
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: By the way, here are Mr. Sotheby's recent spending records you had me look up.
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: I knew it.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Is that the section on medical and cosmetic expenses?
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: Teeth whitening?
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: It seems we were looking in the right direction.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Mr. Lazvar!
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: Just one, tiny little request, if I may?
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: ...Go ahead.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Well, to be honest, my company's ads haven't been doing that well lately, but I have an amazing idea this time...
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: I'm positive it will be a great way to both advertise the Sun of Sand, and change the overly solemn image of the trading post.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: There's no need to change the trading post's image.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: ...Well, I won't lie, I also want to increase exposure for my company.
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: Give and take. That's what business is all about, isn't it?
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: Great idea, don't you think?
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: (Whisper) Mr. Lazvar, this man is just trying to take advantage of us.
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: So, what do you want me to do?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Since we're putting the Sun of Sand on auction, I was thinking about making some posters for it...
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.content: ...And I could think of no better model than you!
attributes.name: Gem Collector

attributes.text: The Sun of Sand, the eternal oasis, the sun that never sets.
Royal artificers have crafted the ultimate masterpiece of teeth whitening.
You, too, can become the owner of this wonderful gem, and a mouth full of white teeth!
Brought to you by Lazvar, overseer of Menat-Ha'mait Gem Trading Postâ€”
Whatever chances you may have missed in life, don't miss this one!

attributes.content: When I give you the cue, lift your chin, show your teeth, and smile!
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: A little further to the right! Next to the statue. That's right!
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: Smile!
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: Er, sir, you need to show your teeth, so that we can demonstrate the effects of the Sun of Sand.
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: Youth and sunshine! Grin from ear to ear!
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: Oh dear, you're frowning now... Mm? There's actually a good one.
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: What's going on, Doyard?
attributes.name: Male Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: How did Farshid get Mr. Lazvar to agree to be the model for the teeth whitening ad?
attributes.name: Male Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: It's a long story... I would refrain from snide comments if I were you. I doubt Mr. Lazvar is in the best mood right now.
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: Good. Let's take a break.
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: You're being too tense. Perhaps a more familiar environment will help you loosen up a bit?
attributes.name: Photographer

attributes.content: Nice posters. How long will they stay up at the trading post and Great Bazaar?
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: ...No later than the auction.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: You should keep one. I like this one, with the trading post in the background. The smile looks so natural.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Don't even start. I don't know if my face muscles will ever be the same again...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Mio's still sleeping...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Don't worry, it's only been a few days. Mio and I have slept for centuries before.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: And you really should get some sleep once this auction is over.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: The trading post and Great Bazaar are never idle, you know, even when there's nothing in particular going on.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Are you tired of it?
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: But I've been having... strange dreams.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: In the dream, I wasn't the overseer sitting behind the counter, but a clockwork fowlbeast sent out to fly through the streets, perching to rest when the wind grows strong.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Rolls over leisurely)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: (Wags tail relaxedly)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Like Mio?
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Haha. Maybe.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Well, Mio is going to miss this auction if they don't wake up. I wanted you guys to help keep an eye on the news that the merchants bring from outside...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: There are still two missing guardian gems.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: As you search for them, Lazvar, I hope you don't forget that your own time is limited too.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: My time is limited, but the life of an overseer only ends when the gems are returned. I'm just doing my duty.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: And I want to reunite you guys with the trove guardian sooner rather than later.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: He's important to you and Mio, isn't he?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: ...Of course.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Lazvar, when was the last time you took a photo for yourself?
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Last time... I think it was when my mother was still around.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: We should have the photographer of the poster take a photo for us.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: I don't know if he'll be able to capture Mio and I, but at least you will know we were by your side.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Dio...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Sure. I'd love to.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Day of the auction
Tea or coffee, Mr. Sotheby?
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: No need. Just lemon water, and please make sure there's no extra coloring in it.
attributes.name: Foreign Merchant

attributes.content: Here you go. Please feel free to let me know if you need anything else.
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: I will, thank you.
attributes.name: Foreign Merchant

attributes.content: Well?
attributes.name: Male Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: Mr. Lazvar was right. Mr. Sotheby has yellow teeth.
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: Did he ask about the Falling Star?
attributes.name: Male Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: Not one word. He was holding the leaflet for the Sun of Sand, you know, the one with Mr. Lazvar's photo on it.
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: He sure has his eye on it...
attributes.name: Male Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: Now, the highlight of the auction.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: From Mr. Farshid, I present to you the Sun of Sand, the brightest sun of Sargon.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Bidding will start at nine million dinar.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Eleven million. Thirteen million. Fifteen million. Seventeen million. Seventeen million.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Raises bid card)
attributes.name: Foreign Merchant

attributes.content: Nineteen million from Mr. Sotheby. Nineteen million.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Raises bid card)
attributes.name: Menat Merchant

attributes.content: Twenty-one million from Mrs. Shalmar, Titan Jewelry. Twenty-one million.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Raises bid card)
attributes.name: Foreign Merchant

attributes.content: (Raises bid card)
attributes.name: Menat Merchant

attributes.content: Twenty-three million. Twenty-five million. Twenty-seven million. Twenty-nine million from Mr. Hamut, Djinni Trade Association.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Mr. Sotheby? What are youâ€”
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I'm leaving my card here. Where's that staff member? Nail my card to the wall, or use Originium Arts, I don't care.
attributes.name: Foreign Merchant

attributes.content: I'm keeping it up and I'm not putting it down, never, no matter how much you people bid!
attributes.name: Foreign Merchant

attributes.content: Let's see who's trying to take the Sun of Sand from me?!
attributes.name: Foreign Merchant

attributes.content: ...Thirty-one million, from Mr. Sotheby. Thirty-one million going once. Thirty-one million going twice.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Sold!
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Wow, that didn't feel real... the auction comes to a close, and the crisis is over?
attributes.name: Male Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: I can't believe Mr. Sotheby was so happy about it...
attributes.name: Male Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: I told you, Mr. Lazvar would find a way out.
attributes.name: Female Trading Post Staff

attributes.content: I can't guarantee a happy ending every time. Besides, we haven't found the Falling Star...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Hello.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: What? You said... Mio...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Mio's not breathing?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Mio, Mio!
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Oh no... the breaths are so weak...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Hang in there, I'll get you a doctor!
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: I told you, there's no point.
attributes.name: Dio

attributes.content: Give me a hand, Dio, I need to get Mio up...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Hey, did something just fall out from the pillow?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Stretches)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: (Yawns)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: A gem... the missing Falling Star! How did it end up under Mio's pillow?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Shut up, you're making my head hurt...
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: What did you just say, Lazvar?
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Finally! You're awake!
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Finally?
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: So it was the Falling Star that made you fall asleep...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: 'A gem that grants restful sleep.'
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: It's in the item description. I should have realized...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Shouldn't you be keeping a close eye on dangerous gems like this?
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: It's a pretty powerful one, to be able to knock a Sovereign of Beasts out.
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: ...If you want to play with a gem, you should tell me first.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: You have no idea how much trouble I had to go through because it went missing...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: (Glares)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: What? Are you blaming me?
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: How was I to know it would knock me out so quickly, when all I did was hold it for a while?
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: And how was I supposed to tell you when I'm asleep?
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Er...
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Plus, this is mainly your fault!
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: My fault?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: If you had picked me up earlier and took me away from the gem, I wouldn't be sleeping for so long, and you would have found it!
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Well... are you feeling okay now?
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: Hmph...
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Not especially, other than being rudely woken up.
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: ...What are you grinning about, human?
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Ha... nothing, nothing. Just happy that you're well.
attributes.name: Lazvar

attributes.content: You're hugging me too tight! I haven't forgiven you yet, Lazvar!
attributes.name: Mio
